page.title: 19Leisure Time in Fritchley
page.content: A cross section of fifty families in Fritchley were asked to indicate how they used their leisure hours. The survey resulted in the following conclusions. Of a total of 306 responses from 110 people the domain of sport was the most popular category with over 20% of the total responses. A wide variety of sports and games were represeuted inculing shooting caving, windsurfing, climbing and fishing but the highest counts were for ball sports. Gardening, reading and walking were next in importance followed by the fields of music, art and craft, knitting and radio/television Of the remaming thirty five leisure time activities recorded, mevtion should be made of vintage bus/tractor maintenance beekeeping, horology and pigeon fancying (!).
